org.svvrl.goal.core.aut

Class AbstractNTBWLikeAcc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditable
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.AutomatonComponent
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.Acc<TransitionRun>
          • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.AbstractNTBWLikeAcc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, SetListener<Transition>, Editable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TBuchiAcc, TCoBuchiAcc

    public abstract class AbstractNTBWLikeAcc
extends Acc<TransitionRun>
implements SetListener<Transition>
    This is a category of acceptance conditions similar to AbstractNBWLikeAcc but the acceptance condition is on transitions.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    AbstractNBWLikeAcc, Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(Transition t)
        Inserts an accepting transition. If the transition is already in this acceptance condition but is invisible, the transition will become visible.
        Parameters:
        t - the transition becoming accepting

      • addAll

        public void addAll(java.util.Collection<Transition> ts)
        Inserts a collection of accepting transitions.
        Parameters:
        ts - the transitions becoming accepting

      • remove

        public void remove(Transition t)
        Removes an accepting transition. The transition will not be removed if it is invisible.
        Parameters:
        t - the transition that is no longer accepting

      • clone

        public AbstractNTBWLikeAcc clone(java.util.Map<State,State> smap,
                                 java.util.Map<Transition,Transition> tmap)
        Description copied from class: Acc
        Makes a clone of this acceptance condition. The content of the clone will be changed according to the given maps.
        Specified by:
        clone in class Acc<TransitionRun>
        Parameters:
        smap - a map from states of the automaton with this acceptance condition to states of another automaton with the clone of this acceptance condition
        tmap - a map from transitions of the automaton with this acceptance condition to transitions of another automaton with the clone of this acceptance condition
        Returns:
        the clone of this acceptance condition

      • setVisible

        protected void setVisible(GraphicComponent c,
                          boolean b)
        Description copied from class: Acc
        Makes a component visible or invisible in this acceptance condition. The effect is the same as removing the component from this acceptance condition but the removal can be recovered.
        Specified by:
        setVisible in class Acc<TransitionRun>
        Parameters:
        c - a component
        b - true to make the component visible and invisible otherwise
